title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Despite JT Toppin's 35-point performance, Illinois outlasted Texas Tech
items.description: Red Raiders' forward JT Toppin shot 12-of-14 in the second half, but Kylan Boswell and No. 14 Illinois overcame No. 11 Texas Tech.

items.title: Andrej Stojakovic finishes tough and-1, extending Illinois lead over Texas Tech
items.description: Andrej Stojakovic finished a tough and-1 play to extend the Illinois Fighting Illini's lead over the Texas Tech Red Raiders.

items.title: Why Stephen Vogt Was Again a Deserving Choice as AL Manager of the Year
items.description: Cleveland’s historic finish, during which Stephen Vogt kept the belief of a Guardians team, was enough to sway my vote for AL Manager of the Year.
